title: Leading deodorant brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Male Lynx has the highest Sales in million GBP and Female Dove has the lowest Sales in million GBP.
The difference of Sales in million GBP between the highest and lowest Brand is 40.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Sales in million GBP in the y axis.
Brand Male Lynx has the highest Sales in million GBP and Female Dove has the lowest Sales in million GBP.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Male Lynx has the highest Sales in million GBP and Female Dove has the lowest Sales in million GBP.
The difference of Sales in million GBP between the highest and lowest Brand is 40.4.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Brand on the y axis.
The Sales in million GBP is highest at Brand Male Lynx and lowest at Brand Female Dove.
The difference of Sales in million GBP between the highest and lowest Brand is 40.4.
The average Sales in million GBP in all 3 Brands is 76.4.
